common

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.core.Sprite
      • common.core.ImageSprite
        • common.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tower

    public class Tile
extends ImageSprite
    Class for drawing tiles. Extends ImageSpriteClass Holds methods to get tile status and position and sprites for tiles

            double width,
            double height,
            Vector2 position)
        Constructor to calls ImageSprite Constructor to draw tile
        Parameters:
        type - Type of sprite based on selection
        width - Width of tile to be drawn
        height - Height of tile to be drawn
        position - (x,y ) coordinates for position at which tile will be drawn
